hero.title: About Momai Brass
hero.subtitle: Excellence in Precision Manufacturing Since 1993
hero.description: Momai Brass has been a pioneering precision components manufacturer for over three decades, delivering high-quality metal parts to diverse industries. Our commitment to technological innovation and precision engineering sets us apart in the manufacturing landscape.

meta.title: Momai Brass - Precision Manufacturing Excellence Since 1993
meta.description: Leading precision components manufacturer with 30 years of experience, specializing in CNC machining for automotive, pneumatic, and hydraulic sectors.

cta.title: Partner with Manufacturing Excellence
cta.subtitle: Transform Your Projects with Our Precision Engineering Solutions

items.title: Company Foundation
items.description: Established in Rajkot with a vision to provide high-precision metal components

items.title: First CNC Machine Investment
items.description: Introduced first CNC machines, marking technological transformation

items.title: Jamnagar Branch Expansion
items.description: Opened manufacturing facility in Jamnagar to enhance production capabilities

items.title: International Market Entry
items.description: Began exporting precision components to international automotive and industrial markets

items.title: Advanced Manufacturing Upgrade
items.description: Invested in state-of-the-art CNC technology, expanding to 40+ precision machines

items.title: Advanced CNC Machining Center
items.description: Cutting-edge CNC machinery enabling high-precision component manufacturing across multiple materials
items.specifications: Multi-axis capabilities, micron-level precision, diverse material compatibility

items.content: Momai Brass is a leading precision components manufacturer with 30 years of expertise, specializing in high-quality metal parts for automotive, pneumatic, hydraulic, and electrical sectors. Our advanced CNC manufacturing capabilities and commitment to innovation have established us as a trusted partner for complex engineering solutions.

items.title: Engineering Design
items.description: Comprehensive design analysis and precision engineering using advanced CAD/CAM technologies

items.title: Material Selection
items.description: Careful selection of brass, stainless steel, aluminum, and copper based on component requirements

items.title: CNC Machining
items.description: Precision manufacturing using state-of-the-art CNC machines with micron-level accuracy

items.title: Quality Inspection
items.description: Rigorous quality control using advanced measuring instruments and testing protocols

items.title: Surface Treatment
items.description: Comprehensive surface finishing including deburring, polishing, and specialized coatings

items.title: Packaging & Delivery
items.description: Secure packaging and timely delivery ensuring component integrity and customer satisfaction
